definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: The kongoni are distracted, and the lion takes full advantage.
sentences.chinese: 东非狷羚分了神，而狮子全面利用了这一点。

sentences.english: At the same time, it caused drought in East Africa.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，它造成了东非地区的干旱。

sentences.english: Some fear that the same fate awaits the last great herds of wildebeests in East Africa.
sentences.chinese: 有人担心同样的命数会发生在东非牛羚群的身上。

sentences.english: It has generated extraordinary refugee flows across thousands of miles in East Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它在东非数千英里的土地上造成了巨大的难民潮。

sentences.english: Which means the vultures have an entire fresh kongoni carcass all to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着秃鹫完全拥有了一具新鲜的东非狷羚尸体。

sentences.english: In east Africa, some people pull out their bottom teeth. They want their top teeth to stick out.
sentences.chinese: 在东非，有的人把下牙全部都拔掉，使上牙能突出来。

sentences.english: It was, at the time, the biggest recorded outbreak of Rift Valley fever in east Africa.
sentences.chinese: 那时，它是东非有记录的最大的裂谷热暴发。

sentences.english: America has repeatedly said that peace in the region is in its own interest.
sentences.chinese: 美国反复表示，东非地区的和平符合美国的国家利益。

sentences.english: The Marula is a deciduous tree native to Southern and Eastern Africa.
sentences.chinese: 马鲁拉树是原产于南非和东非的落叶树种。

sentences.english: Even still, in East Africa people seldom hunt monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，东非的大部分人都很少捕杀猴子。

sentences.english: Engin and near sign agreement for the development of renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 总体来看，东非地区可更新能源发展前景明朗。

sentences.english: It is the only site in East Africa where Lesser Flamingos successfully nest.
sentences.chinese: 该湖是在东非仅有的一处小火烈鸟成功的繁殖地。

sentences.english: An estimated ninety percent of the meat eaten in East Africa comes from pastoralist herds.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，东非地区食用的的肉类90%来自牧区畜群。

sentences.english: But similar laws are being introduced in Uganda and other East African countries.
sentences.chinese: 但是乌干达和其它东非国家正在通过类似的法律。

sentences.english: Countries in East Africa have frozen Libyan assets, in accordance with a United Nations resolution.
sentences.chinese: 一些东非国家依据联合国决议冻结了利比亚的资产。

sentences.english: But it threatens more than 30,000,000 tons a year of production in East Africa.
sentences.chinese: 但已对东非每年3千万吨的产量造成威胁。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
